verses.name: Judges 21:13
verses.text: And the whole congregation sent some to speak to the children of Benjamin that were in the rock Rimmon, and to call peaceably unto them.

verses.name: Judges 21:14
verses.text: And Benjamin came again at that time; and they gave them wives which they had saved alive of the women of Jabesh–gilead: and yet so they sufficed them not.

verses.name: Judges 21:15
verses.text: And the people repented them for Benjamin, because that the Lord had made a breach in the tribes of Israel.

verses.name: Judges 21:16
verses.text: Then the elders of the congregation said, How shall we do for wives for them that remain, seeing the women are destroyed out of Benjamin?
